billing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: preparing and sending to customers lists of amounts of money owed for goods or services
billing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Ineffective credit control and billing procedures resulted in an unacceptable level of bad debts.
billing.translation[1].definitions[1].de: the total value of sales made by a company in a particular period of time
billing.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The company’s UK turnover was £2.5 million, with world-wide billings around £7 million.
billing.translation[1].definitions[2].de: the way that something is described in advertisements
billing.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: Only a small number of overseas visitors attend each year, and the festival hardly merits its ‘International’ billing.
